description: This Java source file defines a mock implementation of a device temperature configuration cluster, including methods for checking and setting high temperature alarms, and maintaining relevant attribute data.

classes.name: MockDeviceTemperatureConfigurationCluster
classes.description: A mock cluster simulating device temperature configuration, capable of handling temperature high alarms.

methods.name: isTemperatureHigh
methods.description: Returns whether the temperature is currently considered high.

methods.name: setTemperatureHigh
methods.description: Sets the high temperature alarm state and triggers an alarm event if the state changes.

methods.name: getAttributeData
methods.description: Retrieves attribute data based on the attribute info, primarily for reporting the current state.

methods.name: setAttributeData
methods.description: Sets attribute data; here it simply returns success without modifying data.
